channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiPortal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiPortal

item.title: CVE-2024-23105|2024-05-14T16:19:14.223Z -- Fortinet -- FortiPortal
item.description: A Use Of Less Trusted Source [CWE-348] vulnerability in Fortinet FortiPortal version 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and version 7.2.0 through 7.2.1 allows an unauthenticated attack to bypass IP protection through crafted HTTP or HTTPS packets.

item.title: CVE-2024-21761|2024-03-12T15:09:16.653Z -- Fortinet -- FortiPortal
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability [CWE-285] in FortiPortal version 7.2.0, and versions 7.0.6 and below reports may allow a user to download other organizations reports via modification in the request payload.
